About

I'm Sibiraj, an aspiring ethical hacker, web developer, and AI enthusiast with a passion for cybersecurity, machine learning, and software development. I specialize in penetration testing, network security, and AI-driven solutions while building scalable and secure applications. With hands-on experience in Python, JavaScript, Flask, React, and cybersecurity tools, I have worked on projects like fraud detection, AI chatbots, and security analysis tools. I hold certifications in AWS Cloud, penetration testing, and data analytics and have participated in hackathons and research competitions. Always eager to learn, I strive to develop innovative tech solutions that enhance security and efficiency.
